Plan a Couples NYC Getaway with the Romance and Relax Package

NYC date ideas can't get much easier than our summer getaway package in Manhattan. Our Romance and Relax Package has everything you'll need to enjoy a long weekend in New York with that special someone.

The two of you will receive wine and chocolates with your luxurious boutique-style room in the heart of Manhattan. This package also includes grab-and-go breakfast for two so you can enjoy a romantic breakfast together each morning before you head out the door.

Some Interesting NYC Date Ideas

Spend some time together during the day at a few of New York's unique date destinations:

Plan a picnic near Bow Bridge in Central Park. This iconic bridge is featured in movies like Autumn in New York and Keeping the Faith.

Stroll through the Butterfly Conservatory at the American Museum of Natural History. A butterfly landing on your shoulder makes the perfect photo opportunity.
